titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation prohibiting the importation of all sorts of glasse whatsoeuer, made in forreigne parts.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiesty: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Confirming a patent granted by James I to Sir Robert Mansell.
Dated at end: Royston, the foureteenth day of October, in the eleuenth yeere of our reigne.
Arms 23; Steele notation: Procla- of 2) dis- of.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
